targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  name = 'Up Account'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  name = 'üè† Rent'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  name = 'üí∞ Savings'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  sum(usd) AS "usd"
FROM binanceData
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval)

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  name = 'üí∞ Savings'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  name = 'Up Account'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  name = 'üè† Rent'
ORDER BY datetime

panels.description: Required money for a house deposit

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  value
FROM accounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  name = 'üí∞ Savings'
ORDER BY datetime

panels.title: Savings Target

panels.description: Required money for a house deposit

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  sum(value) AS "value"
FROM accounts
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval)

panels.title: Total Cash

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  description = 'Accenture' or 
  description = 'Vinsi' OR
  description = 'ATO'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  parentCategory AS metric,
  abs(value)
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  parentCategory AS metric,
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  subCategory AS metric,
  abs(value)
FROM transactions
WHERE
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  asset AS metric,
  usd
FROM binanceData
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime)
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  description = 'Accenture'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value
FROM transactions
WHERE
  description = 'Vinsi'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value, description
FROM transactions
WHERE
  parentCategory = 'None' AND
  description = 'Vinsi' OR
  description = 'Accenture' OR
  description = 'ATO'
  
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value,
  subCategory,
  description
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  value,
  subCategory,
  description
FROM transactions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  parentCategory != 'None'
ORDER BY datetime
